title: Talk About Good Cookbook
description: The original cookbook from Cajun Country, this first Junior League of Lafayette cookbook takes you on a journey through south Louisiana's traditions, cultural heritage and culinary artistries of Cajun food. This versatile cookbook starts with a "roux" and ends with a Gumbo! Talk About Good!, first published in 1967, is now in its 30th printing, with over 775,000 copies sold. This timeless classic is a must for all great cooks. 450 pages, hard-cover with concealed wire. Over 1200 crossed indexed recipes.
author: Junior league of Lafayette
